name: react-vite-typescript
description: React application with Vite and TypeScript

files.TSCONFIG:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2020",
    "useDefineForClassFields": true,
    "lib": ["ES2020", "DOM", "DOM.Iterable"],
    "module": "ESNext",
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "moduleResolution": "bundler",
    "allowImportingTsExtensions": true,
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "noEmit": true,
    "jsx": "react-jsx",
    "strict": true,
    "noUnusedLocals": true,
    "noUnusedParameters": true,
    "noFallthroughCasesInSwitch": true
  },
  "include": ["src"],
  "references": [{ "path": "./tsconfig.node.json" }]
}
files.README:
# {{PROJECT_NAME}}

React application with Vite and TypeScript

## Prerequisites

- Node.js 18+
- npm or yarn

## Installation

```bash
npm install
```

## Development

```bash
npm run dev
```

## Build

```bash
npm run build
npm run preview
```

## Testing

```bash
npm test
```
